Package eg.javatools

Class Libraries

java.lang.Object
eg.javatools.Libraries
public class Libraries
extends java.lang.Object
Stores libraries in different configurations

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Libraries()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> absPaths()
    Gets the list that contains the libraries as absolute paths including those that were given as paths relative to to the project directory
    void configureLibraries​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> libraries, java.lang.String projectDir)
    Configures the libraries.
    java.lang.String errorMessage()
    Gets the message that contains libraries that could not be found
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> forJar()
    Gets the list that contains the libraries formatttted for the classpath entry in a manifest file.
    java.lang.String joined()
    Gets a string in which the libraries are joined with the system's path separator
    java.lang.String joinedAbsPaths()
    Gets a string in which the libraries are joined with the system's path separator and libraries that were given as paths relative to the project directory are converted to absolute paths

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Libraries

      public Libraries()

  • Method Details

    • configureLibraries

      public void configureLibraries​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> libraries, java.lang.String projectDir)
      Configures the libraries. Entries may be existing absolute paths or paths that exist in the specified poject directory. Invalid entries can be retrieved by errorMessage().
      Parameters:
      libraries - the list of (putative) libraries
      projectDir - the directory of the project

    • errorMessage

      public java.lang.String errorMessage()
      Gets the message that contains libraries that could not be found
      Returns:
      the message, the empty string if all libraries are found

    • joined

      public java.lang.String joined()
      Gets a string in which the libraries are joined with the system's path separator
      Returns:
      the joined libraries

    • joinedAbsPaths

      public java.lang.String joinedAbsPaths()
      Gets a string in which the libraries are joined with the system's path separator and libraries that were given as paths relative to the project directory are converted to absolute paths
      Returns:
      the joined libraries

    • absPaths

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> absPaths()
      Gets the list that contains the libraries as absolute paths including those that were given as paths relative to to the project directory
      Returns:
      the list

    • forJar

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> forJar()
      Gets the list that contains the libraries formatttted for the classpath entry in a manifest file. Absolute paths are converted to URLs and folders end with a slash.
      Returns:
      the list
